roleset.name: Nominal version of light verb

role.descr: maker, subject of light verbish noun

roles.note: This roleset should only be used for cases where 'making' acts as a light verb and the object of 'making' is also an eventive, predicating noun. Use argMs for all other arguments-- these cannot be predicted because they are related to the true predicate rather than 'making'.
